org.zuinnote.hadoop.office.format.mapred

Class AbstractSpreadSheetDocumentRecordWriter<NullWritable,SpreadSheetCellDAO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zuinnote.hadoop.office.format.mapred.AbstractSpreadSheetDocumentRecordWriter<NullWritable,SpreadSheetCellDAO>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.RecordWriter<NullWritable,SpreadSheetCellDAO>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExcelRecordWriter

    public abstract class AbstractSpreadSheetDocumentRecordWriter<NullWritable,SpreadSheetCellDAO>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.mapred.RecordWriter<NullWritable,SpreadSheetCellDAO>
    This abstract writer implements some generic functionality for writing tables in various formats

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSpreadSheetDocumentRecordWriter

        public AbstractSpreadSheetDocumentRecordWriter()

      • AbstractSpreadSheetDocumentRecordWriter

        public AbstractSpreadSheetDocumentRecordWriter(java.io.DataOutputStream out,
                                               java.lang.String fileName,
                                               org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                                        throws InvalidWriterConfigurationException,
                                               java.io.IOException,
                                               OfficeWriterException
        Creates an Abstract Record Writer for tables to various document formats
        Parameters:
        out - OutputStream to which the tables should be written to
        fileName - fileName (without path) of the file to be written
        conf - Configuration to be parsed by HadoopOfficeWriteConfiguration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of errors reading from the filestream provided by Hadoop
        InvalidWriterConfigurationException - in case the writer could not be configured correctly
        OfficeWriterException - in case of issues creating the initial document

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(NullWritable key,
                  SpreadSheetCellDAO value)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Write SpreadSheetDAO into a table document. Note this does not necessarily mean it is already written in the OutputStream, but usually the in-memory representation.
        Specified by:
        write in interface org.apache.hadoop.mapred.RecordWriter<NullWritable,SpreadSheetCellDAO>
        Parameters:
        key - is ignored
        value - is a SpreadSheet Cell to be inserted into the table document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
